cleaned_text: Introduction Here at Taste of Nature, we have perfected the art of making snack bars. Our bars don't just taste great...they're great for you. Find Your Taste of Nature. [](#) [](#) Delicious, organic, feel-good snacks Since 1989, Taste of Nature has given snackers a healthy, tastier alternative. Our organic bars are non-GMO project verified, certified gluten-free, and made only with real ingredients. Our Product Certifications We make snacks you can feel good about eating. We are certified Organic, Non-GMO, Gluten-Free, Vegan and Kosher. Proudly made in Canada We are a privately owned and operated Canadian company established in 1989. Our two state-of-the-art facilities are located in Markham, Ontario, where our team develops and manufactures certified organic, non-GMO, gluten-free, kosher and vegan snack bars, as well as private label products.
